I call scam. To play on AlterIW you need:

- MW2 client either fiull or Mp Rip
- 900MB worth of DLC
- An update pack to 1.3.3.7a
- And MoveStimulus.exe if using the MP rip

ok, i have a long story lol. when i was on the updating part, it downloaded a map, then stopped. so i closed it, copied the crack over again, and erased caches.xml then it downloaded another map. i repeated that horrible process for like 8 maps. when it was downloading one of the last maps, the power went out and the computer turned off. when i turned the crack back on, i copied the crack over again and erased caches, and it just went up to the progress that it did before and stopped. i even re-installed the game and nothing works. sorry for telling my life story.

The thing had a mind of its own. It worked later on when I did the same exact thing lol. Vacant, the map it wanted, was indeed the last map it needed for mp to work. Another confirmed working game, thanks

ok ive solved the problem, but i have a new one.
yesterday ive played all night long and no problem. but today ive tryed to conect and appeared me an error that says that the server is offline or that ive misswriten the AlterIWnet.ini but i havent touched it.
what should i do?

open alterIWnet.ini and it should look like this

[Configuration]
Server=server{.}alteriw{.}net
WebHost=auto
Nickname="yourname"
[Dynamic]
HackWarningShown=True
remove {} not []

UPDATE
Due to circumstances beyond our control, server is down.

OVH, our server provider, is having some routing issues which will be resolved shortly.

Thank you.
yeah, that was alright.. the problem was that the server was offline xD tnks tho

is there any way around downloading all 10 DLC files cuz they take forever to download.

About the DLC's, If you've already downloaded the full game (Skidrow) version, You don't need to download them, Just copy everything in the crack folder and paste them in your main CODMW2 folder run the AlterIWnet config, select your username, save, run CODMP and it should update automatically, there you have it :) hope this helps.

About the DLC files, If you've already downloaded the full version (Skidrow) you don't need to download the DLC files, just copy everything in the Crack folder and paste it in the main CODMW2 folder, Run alterIWnet config, Set username, Save, Run Iw4mp, and it should start updating, hope this helps. :)

If your having a problem with the update I suggest doing a little more research, You can find the instructions in the link above, you need to have all the DLC files before updating, Also it may be wise to have the Skidrow version of MW2 worked for me, already on my first prestige, Love this game, Hate the hackers and aimbots but it's worth it. :)
